channel.title: [508] JustinScape Espeon 508 Release [508]
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]JustinScape 508[/size][/center] [font=comic sans ms]Now... In the beginning I wasn't expecting to release this ... I was actually planning on hosting it for a server of my own... Though recently I've decided to switch to RS2HD base, and I am going to work on it under the radar.. The source if originally based of espeon, the source I worked off is Pur3zScape.. Which if you are a 508 fan you may have played servers which use that source.. Well if you've seen my development topic from like last month then you probably watched the video...[/font]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j054UkocD8Q[/youtube]
[size=12pt][font=comic sans ms]Shops: (Note: I changed from the crap shops to the real RS ones..)[/font][/size]
[IMG]http://i1006.photobucket.com/albums/af190/justinxg27/Shops-1.png[/img]
[font=comic sans ms]Some Features I didn't cover in the video: Item selling and buying, prices load from items.CFG Trading... Friends/Ignores PM - Split Chat And lots of other stuff... I just can't remember things at the moment -.- I also removed all crap which I didn't like, Example.. items spawned from quest tab and crap like that [/font][center]
Umm... yeah the download Removed for the time being, due to continued progress..

item.title: [508] JustinScape Espeon 508 Release [508]
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

[center][size=24pt]JustinScape 508[/size][/center]
[font=comic sans ms]Now… In the beginning I wasn’t expecting to release this … I was actually planning on hosting it for a server of my own… Though recently I’ve decided to switch to RS2HD base, and I am going to work on it under the radar…
The source if originally based of espeon, the source I worked off is Pur3zScape… Which if you are a 508 fan you may have played servers which use that source…
Well if you’ve seen my development topic from like last month then you probably watched the video…[/font]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=j054UkocD8Q[/youtube]

[size=12pt][font=comic sans ms]Shops: (Note: I changed from the crap shops to the real RS ones…)[/font][/size]

Shops-1.png664×1024

[font=comic sans ms]Some Features I didn’t cover in the video:
Item selling and buying, prices load from items.CFG
Trading…
Friends/Ignores
PM - Split Chat
And lots of other stuff… I just can’t remember things at the moment -.-
I also removed all crap which I didn’t like, Example… items spawned from quest tab and crap like that
[/font][center]

Umm… yeah the download Removed for the time being, due to continued progress…
